actions: Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens the Yang and augments Jing.

syndromes: Alopecia due to Qi and Blood Deficiency

symptoms: Thin and slow growing hair in children

notes: Soak the herb in alcohol for seven days. Strain and discard the dregs. Use a cotton ball dipped in the decoction to rub the hairless area three to five times per day.
